what-it-does: Checks for missing whitespace around all operators.
why-is-this-bad:
According to PEP 8, there should be one space before and after all
operators.

example-split.example-before:
if number==42:
    print('you have found the meaning of life')
example-split.example-after:
if number == 42:
    print('you have found the meaning of life')
